Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Port service is hosted on and NGINX will use.

Config.Name: JWT Secret
Config.Description: JWT Secret for authentication. Leave blank for a random one.

Config.Name: Allowed Clients
Config.Description: A CSV of allowed client ids. Leave blank to allow all client ids from nginx.

Config.Name: Redirect Path
Config.Description: The path which your OIDC provider will redirect back to. Unless changed in the default NGINX configuration, this doesnt need to be changed.
